name: Way of the Warrior
overview: The planet's greatest warriors have been assembled in a citadel, high atop the Himalayan mountains. It is here that only one challenger will survive and have his name etched with magical blood into the Book of Warriors. The tournament will bring together good, evil, mortal, and immortal. The outcome will lie in the hands of one... you! Find the way, noble challenger, find the Way of the Warrior!
